message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

The paper focuses on zero-shot action recognition in videos, which is a subfield of computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses feature extraction and learning, which are related to machine learning and deep learning, making cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also deals with semantic feature extraction and mapping, which are related to natural language processing and artificial intelligence, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses datasets and protocols, which are related to information retrieval, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category as well.
